name: koa-swagger-server
description: Provides a full backend API and mongoose setup, based on your swagger specs

scripts.pretest: if [ ! -d "./swagger-editor" ]; then wget https://github.com/swagger-api/swagger-editor/releases/download/v2.9.9/swagger-editor.zip; unzip swagger-editor.zip -d swagger-editor; rm swagger-editor.zip; fi

author: Cr4x (https://github.com/Cr4x)
